Articles.Content:
I've found that if I set my parachute to 0.2 they go off at about 9000m, which is about when I wait to pull them. I'm lazy, and want to not have to set this myself. Also, I can trigger the chutes anywhere outside the atmosphere, and then when I'm coming in for reentry and landing, I can just fast forward to atmo and then go get some coffee or something. I know I could do it anyway, but I don't like flaming parachutes even if I'm not watching

Anyway I'm sure there are more relevant uses, but this is what made me think of this idea: Default tweaks. You can currently tweak the items once they're on your ship, both in the VAB/SPH and in flight. What if you could tweak the items in the parts list as well?

A "restore to default" is likely a good idea as well.
I don't see a downside to this except for changing the behavior of right-clicking parts in the list (which currently explodes/minimizes the part details). Nice idea.
